title: I Never Promised You a Rose Garden
description: Aided by a brilliant psychiatrist, and accompanied by her deeply concerned-and terrified-parents, Deborah must undertake a three-year struggle to resist the allure of madness, and rejoin the real world. Poignant and compelling, I Never Promised You a Rose Garden is a "convincing and emotionally gripping" read that introduces an unforgettable young heroine-and stands as a modern classic on the topic of mental illness.
author: Hannah  Green
